info.title: Azure-ContainerStorageRP
info.description: Azure Container Storage Resource Provider API.

get.description: List the operations for the provider
List Pool resources by subscription ID
List Pool resources by resource group

Retry-After.description: The Retry-After header can indicate how long the client should wait before polling the operation status.

parameters.name: properties
parameters.description: The resource properties to be updated.

Location.description: The Location header contains the URL where the status of the long running operation can be checked.

status.description: Indicates if the assignment is in a usable state

id.description: Resource id for the assigned resource

AssignmentId.description: A type definition that refers the id to an Azure Resource Manager resource.

values.name: Assigning
values.description: The assignment of the pool to the resource is in progress

values.name: Assigned
values.description: The assignment to the pool was successful.

values.name: Failed
values.description: The operation of assigning or unassigning the pool failed.

resourceGroup.description: Managed resource group for the pool.

encryption.description: Encryption specifies the encryption configuration for the Azure Disk pool

disks.description: Only required if individual disk selection is desired. Path to disk, e.g. <nodename>:/dev/sda or WWN. Supports specifying multiple disks (same syntax as tags).

AzureDiskSkuName.description: SKU of the underlying managed disk

disks.description: Only required if individual disk selection is desired. Path to disk, e.g. <nodename>:/dev/sda or WWN. Supports specifying multiple disks (same syntax as tags).

Disk.description: Model for disk for that pool is using

id.description: ID is the disk identifier visible to the OS. It is typically the WWN or disk ID in formats such as eui.e8238fa6bf530001001b448b45263379 or 0x5002cf6cbc5dd460

reference.description: Reference is the location of the disk in an external system.

DiskPoolProperties.description: Properties shared between the azureDisk and ephemeralDisk

disks.description: Only required if individual disk selection is desired. Path to disk, e.g. <nodename>:/dev/sda or WWN. Supports specifying multiple disks (same syntax as tags).

resourceGroup.description: Managed resource group for the pool.

encryption.description: Encryption specifies the encryption configuration for the Azure Disk pool

ElasticSanVolumeProperties.description: Properties of the ElasticSAN iSCSI target

targetIqn.description: iSCSI Target IQN (iSCSI Qualified Name); example: "iqn.2005-03.org.iscsi:server"

Encryption.description: Encryption key properties for the pool.

keyName.description: The name of the key vault key.

keyVaultUri.description: The URI of the key vault.

identity.description: The managed service identities assigned to this resource.

replicas.description: The number of data copies. Default 3.

disks.description: Only required if individual disk selection is desired. Path to disk, e.g. <nodename>:/dev/sda or WWN. Supports specifying multiple disks (same syntax as tags).

properties.description: The resource-specific properties for this resource.

PoolListResult.description: The response of a Pool list operation.

value.description: The Pool items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

provisioningState.description: The status of the last operation.

status.description: The operational status of the resource

zones.description: List of availability zones that resources can be created in.

resources.description: Resources represent the resources the pool should have.

poolType.description: Type of the Pool: ephemeralDisk, azureDisk, or elasticsan.

reclaimPolicy.description: ReclaimPolicy defines what happens to the backend storage when StoragePool is deleted

assignments.description: List of resources that should have access to the pool. Typically ARM references to AKS clusters or ACI Container Groups. For local and standard this must be a single reference. For ElasticSAN there can be many.

PoolType.description: Type of the Pool: ephemeralDisk, azureDisk, or elasticsan

PoolTypeUpdate.description: Type of the Pool: ephemeralDisk, azureDisk, or elasticsan

PoolUpdate.description: The type used for update operations of the Pool.

PoolUpdateProperties.description: The updatable properties of the Pool.
